sentences.english: Lactic acid production from sucrose and sugar cane bagasse by Rhizopus oryzae was studied.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究了米根霉利用蔗糖和蔗渣发酵生产乳酸。

sentences.english: Huiquan Li, Jinshu Wang. Recycling and Reuse of Ionic Liquid in Homogeneous Cellulose Acetylation.
sentences.chinese: 蔗渣纤维素在离子液体中的溶解与再生。

sentences.english: The paper provides a research into the technological conditions for the pre-cooking stage and the second stage of cookingbagasse .
sentences.chinese: 研究了蔗渣黑液预煮段和第二段蒸煮的工艺条件。

sentences.english: The effect of different uniformity of bagasse— liquor on cooking quality was experimented.
sentences.chinese: 模拟试验了蔗渣不同料液混合均匀性对蒸煮的影响。

sentences.english: On active development of bagasse as raw material in pulping and paper-making;
sentences.chinese: 主要研究了米根霉利用蔗糖和蔗渣发酵生产乳酸。

sentences.english: The anaerobic treatment of bagasse wastewater by a series of experiments is studied.
sentences.chinese: 对甘蔗渣喷淋废水进行了一系列的厌氧处理实验研究。

sentences.english: A few years before his death he perfected a method of converting bagasse into paper pulp.
sentences.chinese: 在他去世前几年，他改进了用甘蔗渣制纸浆的方法。

sentences.english: The optimum conditions of bagasse neutral sodium sulfite pulping had been studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了甘蔗渣中性亚硫酸钠制浆的最佳工艺条件。

sentences.english: The experiment of bagasse kraft black liquor polymer viscosity control was carried out in the commercial ultrasonic machine.
sentences.chinese: 利用超声波仪对甘蔗渣浆黑液多聚物进行了降粘实验。

sentences.english: The colouring mechanism of bagacillo is also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 对蔗渣糠的致色机理也进行了初步探讨。

sentences.english: The research of conditions for pyrolysis and gasification of sugarcane bagasse in steam;
sentences.chinese: 主要研究了米根霉利用蔗糖和蔗渣发酵生产乳酸。

definition: remnants of material from an industrial process/offcut/scraps
to make fertilizer by steeping organic materials in water and leaving them to decompose/fertilizer produced by this method
